name: Getting Metalical
description:
Do you want some cool graphics? Or maybe... some bad enemy AI's? Oh, i see...
So, i think you want something like... 

GETTING METALICAL, is a first person shooter game or fps with sci-fi thematics, where you can shutdown some anoying enemy drones with your high-tech gun and pew-pew-pew-POOW... something like this...

The game have some cool thing you can found, like, cool graphics, very simple controllers, adaptable resolutions and game quality (from the smaller resolution to the bgger and from low to ultra quality).

This game was made only by me and some unity-assets-store assets....
I hope you enjoy :)

Note: this game is just a demo and may have some or a lot of bugs.
